name: Nonji
description:
INSTRUCTION:
Orange handle deflects orange projectiles
Blue handle deflects blue projectiles
Red handle (Blue handle after chain break) deflects red projectiles and comes back

CONTROLS:
Mouse, ESC - Pause, R - Restart
DESCRIPTION:
Use your magic nunchaku to protect the white portal, but be careful those chains aren't as strong as they look.

Music:

Modern Dojo Battle by tgfcoder

licensed under CC-BY-3
